publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6295.1 Mary Scanlon: NHS Quality Strategyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6295) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to report back to the Parliament by the end of summer recess on how it intends to respond to the needs highlighted in the report, The Healthcare Quality Strategy for NHSScotland, in order to protect NHS frontline services."
